response.overview: After a four year hiatus in a career that has included countless nominations and awards for his talents as a director and filmmaker, including the Free Speech Coalition's Lifetime Achievement Award, Steven Scarborough explodes back onto the all-male adult video scene with RESURRECTION . Boasting a stunning cast of gym-toned, sexy, hung hunks, RESURRECTION features non-stop action with one goal in mind: getting you off. Boldly directed, beautifully lit, and brilliantly edited, RESURRECTION is a masterpiece, once again setting Scarborough and Hot House apart from the rest.
response.title: Resurrection
